name: Koala Camper
text: If this card is in your hand, you can tribute 1 "Koala" monster you control; Special Summon this card. If this card is Summoned by the effect of a "Koala" card: You can discard 1 "Koala" card; add 1 of your banished "Koala" cards to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY by a card effect: You can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use each effect of "Koala Camper" once per turn.
